attributes.action: legislate for insurance companies to use recycled parts for repairs.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many vehicles are needlessly written off for the cost of one or two highly priced new items. Also the carbon footprint for the repair is lower by using these recycled parts.With a relevant British standard for the quality of the parts insurers should be either forced or allowed to use them.It will reduce the cost of repairs and hence could lead also to a reduction in the cost of insurance.Why melt down these parts to make new ones when a perfectly good used one is available?
